sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthServiceService } from '../services/auth-service.service'; declare function getRandomPhoto(): string; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(private authService: AuthServiceService){} getRandomPhotoUrl(){ console.log(getRandomPhoto()); return getRandomPhoto(); } isAuthenticated(){ return this.authService.isAuthenticated(); } doLogout(){ console.log("click"); this.authService.logout(); } }
